ygData.subject: New Horizons Mailing List
ygData.msgSnippet: ============================================= Horizons MMORPG Mailing List Come here to discuss the latest Features , Concepts and Ideas from the HOT-HOT-HOT
ygData.messageBody:
=============================================

Horizons MMORPG Mailing List

Come here to discuss the latest Features , Concepts and
Ideas from the HOT-HOT-HOT upcoming and most highly
anticipating MMORPG of ALL TIME , HORIZONS !
http://www.artifact-entertainment.com/horizons/horizons.htm

This is also a gathering point for players who wish
to make friends b4 the start of the Horizons public beta .
And also serves as a tavern for Guild/Clan recruitment .

All that said , this list is not heavily moderated and all
topics related to the Horizons MMORPG are welcome .

This group aims to become a hot discussion list and
you can help us achieve that ! Target Mail Volume is
expected to reach 15 messages per day and is currently
loosely moderated . PS - U can switch to Daily Digest mode
when the List volume exceeds your tolerance

We hope that the "push" factor of this list
will exceed the popularity of "pull" methods
like web forums and will result in a greater
signal to noise ratio and the creation of
more ideas ! :)

Join Us Today !

For more info visit : http://www.egroups.com/group/HORIZONS_ONLINE

To Subscribe to the list send an email to :
mailto:HORIZONS_ONLINE-subscribe@egroups.com
